attributes.action: We do not trust the government anymore. We need new leadership of the country.
attributes.additional_details:
Repeatedly, the government has shown an inability to provide consistent, reliable and trustworthy leadership in the face of the pandemic. 
We do not want to claim that the government is malicious. We do claim that the government is unable to do its job properly, and requires help.
We need a cross-party leadership system where the country comes together and we can rebuild trust in our country, and the system.
attributes.background: The government has repeatedly showed a lack of ability in dealing with the coronavirus pandemic. Either it is incompetent, or requires help. We want a cross-party leadership with FULL transparency, as the government is not able to lead this nation alone.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Establish a cross-party, cross-discipline panel to scrutinise Covid-19 policies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551051

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
